overview_of_class: This class is designed to prepare students for audio work at a professional level. Student will employ radio reporting and digital audio production techniques to produce weekly assignments. The course will emphasize richly reported news and magazine reports such as those featured most commonly on NPR's programs. Students will study audio story structure, advanced use of sound, scene creation, writing for the ear and developing a narrative voice. Technical instruction and practice is intended to prepare students to produce broadcast quality audio journalism for distribution on the air and through online news organizations.
name: Audio Reporting
subject: JOUR
